name: SOMA West Community Benefit District (CBD)
description: Full mental health services and referral
fullDescription: Full mental health services and referral
whatTheyOffer: SOMA West is the largest geographical district in the City. The boundaries of the District include approximately 2,765 parcels located on approximately 100 blocks, including blocks and partial blocks bounded by 5th Street and 6th Street on the east, Minna Street and Folsom Street on the north, South Van Ness Avenue, and the U.S. Highway 101 Freeway on the west, and Townsend Street on the south. Dedicated to improving the quality of life in SOMA West by creating a cleaner, safer and more vibrant
